Title: The Harpy Problem
Description:
You have my thanks for saving me, $n. I swear to not show such weakness again.

The ogres are planning to sacrifice the rest of the expedition to fuel the ritual that will raise the dragon.

It seems one of the survivors was taken to the hills north of here. Bo scouted ahead to investigate.

Come, we'll see what he has found.
ObjectivesText: Meet with Bo near the Harpy Roost.
RewardText: I have found the missing member of the expedition... but we have many problems to deal with first.
